setEffects.4: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by 25%. Additionally, when not on the field, Elemental Skill DMG will be further increased by 25%. This effect will be cleared 2s after taking the field.

flower.name: Golden Song's Variation
flower.desc: A flower constructed out of clam, mother-of-pearl, and gold leaf. It blooms proudly.

plume.name: Golden Bird's Shedding
plume.desc: A gold feather made using silver and gold filigree. A crystal-clear sapphire is mounted atop it.

sands.name: Golden Era's Prelude
sands.desc: This lovely sundial is inlaid with silver and gold. It seems that time has stopped flowing atop its dial plate.

goblet.name: Golden Night's Bustle
goblet.desc: An ancient silver urn that was once filled with fine wine as red as rubies. Now, it contains nothing but bitter seawater.

circlet.name: Golden Troupe's Reward
circlet.desc: An ancient crown that resembles a stage prop more than it does some suzerain's headgear.
